title: U.S. Air Force Secretary warns China’s space gains are driven by more than copying
description:
Troy Meink says Beijing is innovating, not merely reverse-engineering U.S. systems

The post U.S. Air Force Secretary warns China’s space gains are driven by more than copying appeared first on SpaceNews.
